data.name: Deicider
data.detailed_description:
Dominate the Arena

Entertain the masses and earn grandiose rewards by competing in gladiatorial, arena combat.
Earn the respect of the people and climb the leaderboard ranking for an opportunity to challenge the champions of the arena.

Explore the Dungeon


Take a break in-between your arena fights to explore the procedurally generated surrounding facilities.
Stumble on groups of enemies and find forgotten equipment and treasures
Trade with the merchants and artisans of the prison and its surroundings.

Uncover Powerful Equipment


Arm yourself with 4 different types of equipment, and find your favorite loadout.
Upgrade or exchange your gear to stay competitive with the increasing threat of the arena.
Master each weapon move set, and find interesting synergies.

data.short_description: Win back your freedom through gladiatorial combat and discover the secrets of the arena and its creator. Arm yourself with the strongest equipment you can find and face this crooked, 2D, roguelike, dungeon crawler.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: INTEL CORE I5-8400
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE GTX
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
  • Additional Notes: Work in progress estimates
